channel.title: Can I take a screenie on silab v7 without it showing
channel.description: Anyway I can take a screenie using the webclient without it showing the rest of the screen on my computer? Only the screen of ingame. I could just drop my summoning items and use v5 client but just wondering if I can use the Webclient

item.title: Can I take a screenie on silab v7 without it showing
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“The Prodigyscape, post:4, topic:181733”][quote author=n0va k0 link=topic=243292.msg2055907#msg2055907 date=1203146316]

alt + printscreen -.-

No idiot, Taking a picture using the webclient without it showing the start option and toolpanel. I know how to take a picture.
Thanks, First server -.- never took pictures using clients before except mopar XD I’m not a photographer :]
[/quote]

I’m sorry but did I just hear you don’t know how to crop a photo on the computer?
LOLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL
Sorry…[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Can I take a screenie on silab v7 without it showing
